title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table, they are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The expected behavior is that datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
1. Input new Date() as the content for three items. 
2. Save and preview the items. 
3. Verify that the datetime values are displayed in the same format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
